TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Marorok, title = Marorok, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marorok} }

S.FORM: Marorok Itiniay i Ruisui Cen no Hualien ko Marorok a niyaro', 267 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 708 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 46% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 328 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 54% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 380 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 38%, Paiwan 2%, Bunun 3%, Truku 2%, roma 1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.

Marorok Itiniay i Roisoi Cen no Hoalien ko Marorok a niyaro', 267 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 708 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 46% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 328 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 54% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 380 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 38%, Paiwan 2%, Bonon 3%, Troko 2%, roma 1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
